column1: The pasta dish was absolutely delicious, with a rich and flavorful sauce, but the portion size felt a bit too small considering the price. I would have enjoyed just a little more on the plate to feel fully satisfied.
I ordered the new sandwich and honestly found it disappointing. The bread was dry, and the filling lacked seasoning, making the overall taste bland. I expected better based on the reviews.

The desserts here are consistently amazing. The cheesecake was creamy and perfectly balanced, not overly sweet, and the presentation was beautiful. I would definitely come back just for the dessert menu.
While the staff was friendly and attentive, the meal took far too long to arrive. By the time it reached the table, it was only lukewarm. The delay really impacted the overall experience.
I tried the vegan bowl for the first time and was pleasantly surprised. The ingredients were fresh, the flavors were vibrant, and it felt both healthy and satisfying. Great option for a light meal.
The soup had a nice flavor but was served with far too much salt. I enjoy savory food, but this was overwhelming and made it difficult to finish the bowl.
The burger was juicy and cooked exactly as requested. The toppings complemented each other really well, and the fries on the side were crisp and perfectly seasoned.
The smoothie tasted artificial and overly sweet, almost like a dessert rather than a refreshing drink. I would prefer more natural fruit flavors instead of heavy syrups.
The breakfast platter was generous and well-prepared. The eggs were fluffy, the toast was perfectly crisp, and the fruit was fresh. It had a nice balance and was worth the price.

I appreciated the creativity behind the fusion menu, but some dishes felt like they were trying too hard. The flavors didnâ€™t blend naturally, and it left me unsure about what the dish was supposed to be.
